coda.count 0.2.2
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Clustering multivariate count data using the log-ratio-normal-multinomial distribution
    • The logratio-normal-multinomial distribution

    Dirichlet-multinomial random sample

    rdm.Rd

    Dirichlet-multinomial random sample

    rdm(n = NULL, size, alpha, probs = FALSE)

    Arguments

    n

    sample size

    size

    vector to set the multinomial sampling size. vector is reused to have length equal parameter n

    alpha

    Dirichlet-multinomial parameter

    probs

    logical indicating whether multinomial probabilities should be returned

    Value

    Dirichlet-multinomial random sample

    Examples

    rdm(100, 1000, c(1,1,1))
#>        [,1] [,2] [,3]
#>   [1,]  122   66  812

rdm(size = c(1000, 100, 10, 2, 1), alpha = c(1,1,1))
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3]
#> [1,]  732  173   95
